item.description:
| **Date** | **Author** | **Comments** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 25-07-2022 | Bhavitha Nanabolu | Re-ordering of entities after adding nested cu. |

**Reviewer: Nagaraju Siripuram**

**Description:** Create a nested solution with 2 entities in main GSI. Now edit the CU in main GSI and re-order both the entities and click on finish button. Publish the soluition and execute it.
